title: Directory Listing and Information Disclosure via /admin/ and /images/ on testphp.vulnweb.com
vulnerability_information:
## Summary Multiple directories on `http://testphp.vulnweb.com` have directory listing enabled via nginx autoindex, exposing internal file structures and sensitive files. The `/admin/` directory exposes a `create.sql` file containing the full database schema, and the `/images/` directory lists all image assets. The server also exposes version information via headers: `nginx/1.19.0` and `PHP/5.6.40`. ## Steps to Reproduce ### 1. Directory Listing on /admin/ ```bash curl -s 'http://testphp.vulnweb.com/admin/' ``` Response: ```html Index of /admin/

Index of /admin/

../
create.sql    11-May-2011 10:27    523
``` The `create.sql` file is directly downloadable and contains the full database schema. ### 2. Directory Listing on /images/ ```bash curl -s 'http://testphp.vulnweb.com/images/' ``` Response: ```html

Index of /images/

../
logo.gif      11-May-2011 10:27    6660
remark.gif  11-May-2011 10:27      79
``` ### 3. Server Version Disclosure ```bash curl -sI 'http://testphp.vulnweb.com/' ``` Response headers: ``` Server: nginx/1.19.0 X-Powered-By: PHP/5.6.40-38+ubuntu20.04.1+deb.sury.org+1 ``` PHP 5.6.40 is end-of-life and contains numerous known CVEs. The full OS version (Ubuntu 20.04) is also disclosed. ## Impact - **Database schema disclosure** — the `/admin/create.sql` file reveals the complete database structure, table names, column names, and data types, making SQL injection attacks easier to craft - **Sensitive file exposure** — directory listing may reveal backup files, configuration files, or other sensitive data - **Server fingerprinting** — exact nginx (1.19.0) and PHP (5.6.40) versions enable targeted exploitation of known CVEs - **Attack surface mapping** — directory listings help attackers map the application structure for further attacks - **PHP 5.6 EOL** — this version has not received security updates since December 2018, exposing the application to numerous unpatched vulnerabilities
